verses.text: <a href="../2-Peter-1-1/" title="2 Peter 1:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Simon Peter, a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ, to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ:

<a href="../2-Peter-1-2/" title="2 Peter 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,
3 "JESUS_END"According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue:

<a href="../2-Peter-1-4/" title="2 Peter 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.
<a href="../2-Peter-1-5/" title="2 Peter 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;
<a href="../2-Peter-1-6/" title="2 Peter 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"And to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness;
<a href="../2-Peter-1-7/" title="2 Peter 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.
8 "JESUS_END"For if these things be in you, and abound, they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-9/" title="2 Peter 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"But he that lacketh these things is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-10/" title="2 Peter 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:

<a href="../2-Peter-1-11/" title="2 Peter 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
12 "JESUS_END"Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things, though ye know them, and be established in the present truth.
13 "JESUS_END"Yea, I think it meet, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by putting you in remembrance;
14 "JESUS_END"Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-15/" title="2 Peter 1:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-16/" title="2 Peter 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"For we have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-17/" title="2 Peter 1:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"For he received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-18/" title="2 Peter 1:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"And this voice which came from heaven we heard, when we were with him in the holy mount.

<a href="../2-Peter-1-19/" title="2 Peter 1:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:

<a href="../2-Peter-1-20/" title="2 Peter 1:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"Knowing this first, that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation.
21 "JESUS_END"For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.
